Description: This is template deploys a Zabbix and Grafana server in an existing VPC environment.

MasterPassword.ConstraintDescription: Input your database Password, Min 8, Maximum of 30 characters.
MasterPassword.Description: Enter your Database Password, Min 8, maximum of 30 characters. This password is used for the admin user of Zabbix Mysql Database.

MasterUser.ConstraintDescription: Input your database UserName, Min 3, Maximum of 30 characters.
MasterUser.Description: Enter your Database Master UserName, Min 8, maximum of 30 characters. This user is used for the admin user of Zabbix Mysql/Aurora Database.

DomainName.Description: Name of Private Route53 Domain to reach your Zabbix Endpoint after setup.

KeyPairName.ConstraintDescription: must be the name of an existing EC2 KeyPair.
KeyPairName.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the instance

ZabbixGrafanaInstanceType.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid EC2 instance type.
ZabbixGrafanaInstanceType.Description: Choose your Custom Instance type for Zabbix Server

ZabbixGrafanaDatabaseType.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid Database Engine type.
ZabbixGrafanaDatabaseType.Description: Choose your Database Engine type for Zabbix Server

PrivateSubnetID1.Description: ID of the private subnet aka Availability Zone needed for Zabbix Server and DBSubnet(e.g., subnet-a0246dcd)

PrivateSubnetID2.Description: ID of the private subnet aka Availability Zone needed for DBSubnet(e.g., subnet-a0246dcd)

PublicSubnetID.Description: ID of the public subnet aka Availability Zone for the LoadBalancer(e.g., subnet-a0246dcd)

QSS3BucketName.ConstraintDescription: Quick Start bucket name can include numbers, lowercase letters, uppercase letters, and hyphens (-). It cannot start or end with a hyphen (-).
QSS3BucketName.Description: S3 bucket name for the Quick Start assets. Quick Start bucket name can include numbers, lowercase letters, uppercase letters, and hyphens (-). It cannot start or end with a hyphen (-).

QSS3KeyPrefix.ConstraintDescription: Quick Start key prefix can include numbers, lowercase letters, uppercase letters, hyphens (-), and forward slash (/). It cannot start or end with forward slash (/) because they are automatically appended.
QSS3KeyPrefix.Description: S3 key prefix for the Quick Start assets. Quick Start key prefix can include numbers, lowercase letters, uppercase letters, hyphens (-), and forward slash (/). It cannot start or end with forward slash (/) because they are automatically appended.

ZabbixGrafanaAMIOS.Description: Operating system and version for Zabbix Server.

Assertions.AssertDescription: All subnets must in the VPC
Must have the ELB (Public Subnet) in the same AZ as the Private Subnet.

HostedZoneConfig.Comment: Private Hosted Zone for Zabbix/Grafana Domain

Properties.GroupDescription: Instances with management access to Grafana server
Grafana server management and access ports
Grafana ELB http, https communication and management ports
Instances with management access to Zabbix server
Zabbix server management and access ports
Zabbix inter-agent communication and management ports
Zabbix ELB http, https communication and management ports
Zabbix RDS inter-server communication and management ports

ZabbixMyqlPrivateIPAddress.Description: Zabbix  Instance private IP addres that uses local MySql

ZabbixAuroraPrivateIPAddress.Description: Zabbix Instance private IP address that uses Aurora Cluster

GrafanaMyqlPrivateIPAddress.Description: Grafana Instance private IP addres that uses local MySql

GrafanaAuroraPrivateIPAddress.Description: Grafana Instance private IP address that uses Aurora Cluster
